title: Can you put SD card Slot on upcoming Google Pixel phones?? Can you make affordable like 180 Dollars?
content: Please make Google Pixel that has Sd card with the price of 150-200 USD?? PLEASE RELEASE HERE IN THE PHILIPPINES üôè... I WANT GOOGLE PIXEL WITH AFFORDABLE PRICE WITH SD CARD SLOT. I REALLY WANT OVERALL IN PIXEL IF IT IS HAS SD CARD SLOT...
